thread.title: Great hotel in a great location
thread.title_full: Great hotel in a great location - Review of The Nadler Victoria, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: DCoro
title: Great hotel in a great location
text:
I've stayed at another Nadler hotel before at Kensington and this one is even better, rooms are bigger that most of the rooms i've stayed in London, well equipped, clean, with great sleep quality, and the location is great, 2 blocks away from Victoria Station, the area is getting updated with new buildings and lots of new restaurants, and close to many of the main attractions in the city. Staff was also really nice and helpful. I definitely will come back to this place in the future.
See all photos
